title.rendered: Info resources about divesting from fossil fuels

content.rendered: I’ve been working on this for more than a decade.  In 2014 I compiled this list of easy-to-read factual resources.  Many more exist now.  These are likely to still be valid.  My e-mail address changed from what’s on this page.  My current e-mail is glen@parallaxperspectives.org
